name: Watchful Valley
description:
Watchful Valley is a free open exploration, RPG puzzle-solving treasure-hunting adventure where you play as a Grim Reaper named Helm.

You're on your daily duty to collect an assigned soul for your boss (Mother Nature) to continue the cycle of life.  Can you find all the treasures on this unusually strange adventure? Will you uncover and solve all the side quests? Explore all the space around you and immerse yourself in Helm's shoes, that is, if he has any!

Rated T for teens: Contains suggestive themes, crude humor, and mild graphic language. 

Expected playtime for 1st play-through is about 10-15 hours.
